title: Servers
body: I have been living in Los Angeles California for 8 years but I recently moved to Nigeria. I was wondering what server I could get the best ping from over there. heard South Africa is supposed to use EUW but Nigeria is not in the South its in the West so I'm not sure which server to use. Please help!{{item:3151}}

replies.body: Playing on NA would certainly cause higher ping due to the physical distance from the game server.  As far as EU, your best bet is to play on both and see which one is best fit for you.  Turkey could also be an option as well.  Play a few games in a custom to see how it goes, and make your choice!
